title: Mixed Dal and Rice Porridge Mix Recipe For Babies
content:
Mixed dal and rice porridge mix for babies which is very healthy for them. This is a great porridge for weight gain, you can feed babies this for lunch.

This healthy dal rice porridge mix is a great way to feed babies dal and rice. This protein-rich health powder is a 

You can start this powder for babies above 8 months. 

 

Mixed Dal & Rice Porridge Mix for Babies

 

Preparation time

10 mins

 

Cook time

15 mins

 

Total time

25 mins

 

Recipe type: Baby Food

Cuisine: Indian

Serves: 2.5 cups

 

Ingredients

FOR HEALTH MIX POWDER:

Rice - 1.5 cup

Masoor Dal - ¼ cup

Moong Dal - ¼ cup

Green Gram - ¼ cup

Roasted Gram Dal - ¼ cup

Toor Dal - ¼ cup

 

FOR PORRIDGE:

Health Mix powder - 3 tablespoon

Water - 1 cup

Cumin Powder - ½ tsp

Asafoetida / Hing / Kaya Podi a pinch

Garlic - 1 clove grated

Ghee - 1 tsp

Salt to taste

Instructions

Take all dals in a sieve and wash well. dry completely.

Take rice in a sieve and wash well. Dry completely.

Take dals in a pan and rice in another pan and roast on medium heat till roasted.

Remove to a bowl and cool completely.

Powder fine. Store in an airtight container.

For making porridge. Take powder in a saucepan, add water, garlic, cumin powder, asafoetida and cook on low heat for 5 to 7 mins till done.

Now remove to a bowl, add salt and ghee and mix well.

Serve.
